unicef-cp15.def: Percentage of girls and boys 15–19 years old who consider a husband to be justified in hitting or beating his wife for at least one of the specified reasons, i.e., if his wife burns the food, argues with him, goes out without telling him, neglects the children or refuses sexual relations.
unicef-cp15.name: Justification of wife-beating among adolescents
unicef-cp15.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
unicef-cp15.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
